EmailTemplate.name: Lacerte - Open Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Regarding your interest in Lacerte Tax Software
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit - Lacerte Tax
Dear {!Contact.Name},
My name is {!User.Name} with Lacerte Tax software. You contacted our department inquiring about our tax program. To expedite your request I need to speak to you for less than 2 minutes. During our conversation I'll walk you through the evaluation process so you can make a go/no go decision quickly and painlessly. When is a good time for us to speak?
You can call me at {!User.Phone} or reply back with your number and best time to reach you.
Sincerely, {!User.Name}
We have a free webinar live every Monday, Wednesday and Friday that shows the differences between Lacerte and your current software.
IMPORTANT: Intuit respects the personal nature of email communication. Every effort is made to offer only information that may be of value to you or your business. If you do not wish to receive marketing email from Intuit in the future, please click here.
If you have any questions or comments, please DO NOT REPLY to this email. Contact Customer Service at 800.765.7777 for assistance. If you receive an email message that appears to come from Intuit but that you suspect is a phishing email, please forward it immediately to spoof@intuit.com. Please visit http://security.intuit.com for additional security information.

Intuit Inc., Customer Communications, 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706
